articles.title: Google’s Gmail Upgrade—Millions Of Accounts Now At Risk - Forbes
articles.description: Millions of Gmail users do not know these changes are coming — are you affected?

articles.title: iPhone users begin to receive payouts from $95 million Siri privacy settlement - 9to5Mac
articles.description: Early last year, Apple agreed to settle a class action lawsuit regarding ‘unlawful and intentional recording’ of conversations with Siri....

articles.title: Ubisoft Has Reportedly Killed One of Its Biggest Franchises for Good - ComicBook.com
articles.description: Ubisoft has reportedly killed one of its biggest franchises for good, only a decade after it debuted with great promise on PS4 and Xbox One.

articles.title: What's The Biggest Difference Between Ford's Coyote And GM's LS Engines? - Jalopnik
articles.description: The biggest differences between Ford's Coyote and GM's LS engines are their camshaft locations and their sizes. The Ford engines also produce more horsepower.

articles.title: Microsoft just issued a second emergency OS update for Windows 11 this month - Windows Central
articles.description: Another out of band update has been issued to Windows 11 users to address a major bug that caused Outlook to become inoperable after January's disastrous Patch Tuesday updates.
